desc.name: Development of a service that automates the collection of emails from different job boards and sends personalized emails to each candidate who has applied to the job
Data collection service built with google puppeteer automation
Integrated NextJs front-end with an Express Rest API and MySQL database
Published to AWS through CI/CD workflow configured with Shippable
Part of the web team doing back-end feature development mostly using Python and PHP tech stacks.
Gathering business requirements and coming up with efficient technical solutions to address them.
Creation of a CMS for the efficient management and personalization of information related to admission processes.
